mapper.insert: insert into bisUser( bisid, passwd, bisname, post1, post2, addr1, addr2, phone1, phone2, phone3) values(#{bisid},#{passwd},#{bisname},#{post1},#{post2},#{addr1},#{addr2},#{phone1},#{phone2},#{phone3})
mapper.select: select bisid, passwd, bisname, post1, post2, addr1, addr2, phone1, phone2, phone3 from bisUser where bisid = #{bisid} and passwd=#{passwd}
select bisid, bisname, post1, post2, addr1, addr2, phone1, phone2, phone3 from bisUser where approval = 'N'
select bisid, bisname, post1, post2, addr1, addr2, phone1, phone2, phone3, approval from bisUser
select bisid, passwd, bisname, post1, post2, addr1, addr2, phone1, phone2, phone3 from bisUser where bisid = #{bisid}
mapper.update: update bisUser set passwd = #{passwd}, post1 = #{post1}, post2 = #{post2}, addr1 = #{addr1}, addr2 = #{addr2}, phone1 = #{phone1}, phone2 = #{phone2}, phone3 = #{phone3} where bisid = #{bisid}
update bisUser set approval = 'Y' where bisid = #{bisid}
